welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tatalon, Philippines! Get ready to experience the warm hospitality and charm of our city, known for its vibrant culture and breathtaking natural beauty. We invite you to explore and embrace all that Tatalon has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights at Ninoy Aquino International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal.
